question: Some people like taking vacations in the countryside. Other people enjoy going to a large city on vacation. Which do you prefer and why?
answer: I enjoy going to a large city on vacation. I have some reasons. Okay, firstly it is obvious that I can meet various people and learn about society. I can learn how to deal with others. There will be a lot of new opportunities to explore more. It is very essential for a young person like me. And um~ I can have more fun, because there are a wide range of food, shops, and activities. Let me tell you my story, because it will be more effective. When I traveled northern part of Canada, the nature was beautiful. But I was very bored. That’s it.

question: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents should always give their children advice or suggestions. Use specific reasons and details to support your opinion.
answer: I agree that parents should always give their children advice or suggestions. I have some reasons. Okay, firstly it is obvious that children are immature and most are out of control. They do not know what is right and what is wrong! One thing is for sure, most children dislike studying and don't make the right decisions. So, parents must teach and take care of their children. Let me tell you my story, because it will be more effective. When I was a high school student, my parents were very strict. Because of this, I was a good student. That’s it.

question: What are the advantages of starting your own company instead of being employed by a company? Use specific ideas and examples to support your opinion.
answer: There are some advantages of starting my own company. I have some reasons. Okay, firstly it is obvious that I will work harder, and it is possible to earn a lot of money. The second point is that I can have flexible schedules, and do whatever I want. Let me tell you a story, because it will be more effective. I have a friend and he is running a small store. He told me that his life is very busy, but he is proud of himself, and he earned a lot of money. That’s it.

question: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Social media has improved communication between people. Use specific ideas and examples to support your opinion.
answer: I agree that social media has improved communication between people. I have some reasons. First, people share their pictures and life stories through social media. I can share my life with people around the world. The second point is that it allows free and real­ time communication. There is no delay and no fee. Let me tell you a story, because it will be more effective. I have a friend and she is living in Canada. We always chat on “SNAPCHAT” all times. I can’t meet her in person, but we share our life online. That’s it.

question: Some people prefer to work alone at home, and others prefer to work with a team in an office. Which do you prefer and why? Use specific reasons and details to support your opinion.
answer: I prefer to work with a team in an office. I have some reasons. Firstly, it is obvious that I can communicate effectively with my co-workers. By communicating, we can understand each other's differences and solve problems quickly. In addition, people can get closer to one another and can achieve better results. Second, I am lazy. Let me tell you a story, because it will be more effective. When I was an intern, I worked at home twice a week. That time, I didn’t work hard. That’s it.

question: What are the advantages of being able to cook? Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
answer: There are some advantages of being able to cook. I have some reasons. Firstly, it is obvious that I can make healthy food. To keep myself healthy, I seriously care about my health. These days, people don’t have enough time to consider their physical health, and getting a lot of stress is another matter to think about. In my case, I try to cook at home, and take care of my health. Also, um~ I can save money. Let me tell you a story, because it will be more effective. A few days ago, I made pasta at home. I never used MSG. That’s it.
